author: cms-sw
body:
New release cycle 13.1.X
- Disabled all extra flavors of 13.0.X: Only following IBs/Releases are active now for 13.0.x all the rest (ASAN, UBSAN, DBG, DEVEL, CLANG etc.) are disabled now and moved to 13.1.X release cycle
  - el8_(amd64|aarch64|ppc64le)_gcc11:  IB + release
  - slc7_amd64_gcc11: IB + release
  - GPU el8_amd64_gcc11:  IB only
  - el9_amd64_gcc11: IB only

FYI @cms-sw/orp-l2
title: New release cycles 13.1.X
